name: @carto/cra-template-sample-app-3
description: CARTO 3 template Sample App for Create React App

scripts.clean: cd template && rm -rf build && rm -rf _templates && rm -rf cypress && rm -rf node_modules && rm -f package.json && rm -f yarn.lock && rm -f yarn-error.log && rm -f package-lock.json && rm -f package.dev.json && rm -f .eslintcache
scripts.prepare-release: yarn clean && cp template/README.md README.md && cp -r ../hygen/_templates template/_templates && sync
scripts.publish:prerelease: yarn run prepare-release && yarn publish --access public --non-interactive --tag prerelease
scripts.publish:release: yarn run prepare-release && yarn publish --access public --non-interactive
